name: Piwik
description: Piwik is the leading open-source analytics platform that gives you more than just powerful analytics:

ADMIN_LOGIN.description: This is the login name used to login to the web traffic monitoring app

ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: This is the password used to login to the web traffic monitoring app

ADMIN_EMAIL.description: I think you can configure emails, so change this value if you want

DB_PREFIX.description: MySQL database prefix for tables. It's pretty much pointless in a 12f environment...
